data.title: Home
data.text:
We have compiled a list of members who provide places, spaces and opportunities for kids' parties, or just to go and have fun and be active during summer.

Find out what's coming up in Yorkton, or enter your event so others know about it.

The Yorkton Legion's Honour Our Veterans project showcases local veterans on banners which are displayed on lamp posts from the beginning of October to immediately after Remembrance Day.

Map showing locations of banners in 2023

That pin-point of light near the centre of North America... that's Yorkton, in east-central Saskatchewan on the Trans Canada Yellowhead Highway. To see which roads lead to Yorkton, take a look at our maps page.

Bidding to host a convention? Planning a meeting or convention in Yorkton? We have a package of information for local groups and individuals bidding on conventions and events to give planners an overview of facilities and services

Tourism Yorkton's relocation package has everything you need to know about services, facilities and quality of life in Yorkton.

Our Wedding Guide is a listing of all the services needed to plan a wedding in Yorkton.

Yorkton Tribal Council has built a tipi on the grounds of the Tourism Yorkton / Yorkton Chamber of Commerce building on Highway 9 & 16. Scan the QR code to read about Tipi Teachings on the YTC website.

Books about Yorkton's history are for sale at Tourism Yorkton. We also provide a wide variety of publications in PDF format, which are free to download.

No matter what you're looking for... accommodations of all sorts, food and beverages, things to do, things to see, places to go or shop...our members are here for you.

Visit our member listings by selecting the member category from the Members menu at the top of the page.
